name: Gerbyil
messages: Today is a glorious day... the best day since I opened my gerbil farm in 2009.
And the rules have changed... we are permitted to write significantly more. I'd love to continue sharing my gerbil facts, if this is, a, heh, open invitation...

I won't spam chat too much, but feel free to visit my gerbil farm in Nevada - it's called Gerbila Farms. We pride ourselves in being extraordinarily humane in our breeding process, and providing nothing but the best care for our offspring.
